title: Crystal helm (attuned)

properties.name: description
properties.value: An attuned crystal helm is a piece of crystal armour created within The Gauntlet, made from 60 crystal shards, 1 basic crystal helm, 1 crystal ore, 1 phren bark, and 1 linum tirinum.

content:
Crystal helm (attuned)
Released25 July 2019 (Update)
MembersYes

ExamineA shinier helmet that provides some protection from crystalline creatures.

Value1 coin
AlchemyNot alchemisable
Weight2.721 kg
Advanced data
Item ID23887

An attuned crystal helm is a piece of crystal armour created within The Gauntlet, made from 60 crystal shards, 1 basic crystal helm, 1 crystal ore, 1 phren bark, and 1 linum tirinum.

It can be upgraded into a perfected crystal helm by using 80 crystal shards, 2 crystal ore, 2 phren bark, and 2 linum tirinum.

 Attack bonuses
+6+6+2+6+6
 Defence bonuses
+48+48+48+48+48
 Other bonusesSlot

[[File:Crystal helm (attuned) chathead.png|left]]
An '''attuned crystal helm''' is a piece of crystal armour created within [[The Gauntlet]], made from 60 [[crystal shards]], 1 [[crystal helm (basic)|basic crystal helm]], 1 [[crystal ore]], 1 [[phren bark]], and 1 [[linum tirinum]].

It can be upgraded into a [[Crystal helm (perfected)|perfected crystal helm]] by using 80 crystal shards, 2 crystal ore, 2 phren bark, and 2 linum tirinum.
